Activity commands operate on [Activity Executions](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-8a7dc280-27f0-4ef8-939c-70f6b447989d" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-8a7dc280-27f0-4ef8-939c-70f6b447989d" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-8a7dc280-27f0-4ef8-939c-70f6b447989d" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.

To run an Activity command, type `temporal activity [command] [command options]`

## complete

The `temporal activity complete` command completes an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-42a83333-ec8c-44a8-b51c-3e8ddb7eac48" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-42a83333-ec8c-44a8-b51c-3e8ddb7eac48" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-42a83333-ec8c-44a8-b51c-3e8ddb7eac48" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.
Along with completing the Activity, the result given upon return can be set as well.

`temporal activity complete --activity-id=MyActivity --result=ActivityComplete`

Use the options listed below to change the behavior of this command.

- [--activity-id](/cli/cmd-options#activity-id) <span id="i-eac53774-f11d-42b6-b6c5-913730340479" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-eac53774-f11d-42b6-b6c5-913730340479" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-eac53774-f11d-42b6-b6c5-913730340479" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal activity-id</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Identifies the Activity Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity id</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity execution</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-32c783c5-6334-4876-a174-69b7d0320490" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-32c783c5-6334-4876-a174-69b7d0320490" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-32c783c5-6334-4876-a174-69b7d0320490" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--identity](/cli/cmd-options#identity) <span id="i-e22718b5-a7f0-4996-a22b-e3901a76100d" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e22718b5-a7f0-4996-a22b-e3901a76100d" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e22718b5-a7f0-4996-a22b-e3901a76100d" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal identity</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Specify operator's identity.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">operator</span></div></div>

- [--limit](/cli/cmd-options#limit) <span id="i-0b68cd87-77b2-47fc-857b-dcca4d673569" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-0b68cd87-77b2-47fc-857b-dcca4d673569" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-0b68cd87-77b2-47fc-857b-dcca4d673569" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal limit</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Number of items to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

## fail

The `temporal activity fail` command fails an [Activity Execution](/activities#activity-execution) <span id="i-ad78d524-7eca-4a4a-b267-310e1f1894c8" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-ad78d524-7eca-4a4a-b267-310e1f1894c8" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-ad78d524-7eca-4a4a-b267-310e1f1894c8" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is an Activity Execution?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">An Activity Execution is the full chain of Activity Task Executions.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.
The Activity must already be running on a valid [Workflow](/workflows#) <span id="i-e85f312b-e38f-49b0-94d1-fe346eedace4" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e85f312b-e38f-49b0-94d1-fe346eedace4" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e85f312b-e38f-49b0-94d1-fe346eedace4" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">What is a Workflow?</div><div class="preview-modal-description">In day-to-day conversations, the term "Workflow" frequently denotes either a Workflow Type, a Workflow Definition, or a Workflow Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">term</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">explanation</span></div></div>.
`temporal fail --workflow-id=meaningful-business-id --activity-id=MyActivity`

Use the options listed below to change the behavior of this command.

- [--activity-id](/cli/cmd-options#activity-id) <span id="i-0fb8e6c6-7d33-4544-8991-22a390ca0a87" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-0fb8e6c6-7d33-4544-8991-22a390ca0a87" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-0fb8e6c6-7d33-4544-8991-22a390ca0a87" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal activity-id</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Identifies the Activity Execution.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity id</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity execution</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>

- [--detail](/cli/cmd-options#detail) <span id="i-e3663253-ec16-4149-a725-8eb4eb534468" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-e3663253-ec16-4149-a725-8eb4eb534468" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-e3663253-ec16-4149-a725-8eb4eb534468" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal detail</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Detail to fail the Activity.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">activity</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">failures</span></div></div>

- [--fields](/cli/cmd-options#fields) <span id="i-246352d7-4338-4b7f-b0af-43605750c88a" class="clickable-i clickable-link-preview">ðŸ”—</span><div id="preview-modal-246352d7-4338-4b7f-b0af-43605750c88a" class="preview-modal"><div class="modal-header"><div id="x-246352d7-4338-4b7f-b0af-43605750c88a" class="clickable-x clickable-link-preview">x</div><b>Link preview</b></div><div class="preview-modal-title">temporal fields</div><div class="preview-modal-description">Customize fields to print.</div><div class="preview-modal-tags"><span class="preview-modal-tag">cli reference</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">temporal cli</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">options-feature</span> <span class="preview-modal-tag">command-line-interface-cli</span></div></div>
